TEXT.German: Leeres Geschwätz. Diese treuen Seelen würden sich nie an meinem, also, ähäm, ich meine natürlich seiner Majestät Eigentum vergreifen. Hinfort! Beleidigt mein Ohr nicht mit solchen Lügenmärchen.
TEXT.Italian: They will not! Such Talking is rubbish!
TEXT.Spanish: They will not! Such Talking is rubbish!

TEXT.English: Take some gold to pay more guards and be prepared!
TEXT.French: Что ж, это, к сожалению, слишком верно. Возьмите немного золота и усильте охрану. Будем надеяться, что мы сможем отослать этих жадных негодяев как можно быстрее.
TEXT.German: Nun, das ist leider nur allzu wahr gesprochen. Nehmt etwas Gold und verstärkt die Wachmannschaften. Lasst uns hoffen, dass wir diese Quellen der Gier so rasch als möglich verschiffen können.
TEXT.Italian: Take some gold to pay more guards and be prepared!
TEXT.Spanish: Take some gold to pay more guards and be prepared!

TEXT.English: Get every adventurer on a horse and run them out of town. Let them find their own gold somewhere far, far away ...
TEXT.French: Собери людей вместе! Пусть возвещают на каждой ярмарке, что богатства земли неизмеримы и что всякий, кто с желанием и волей отважится проникнуть в ее недра, может достать золото голыми руками! Далеко от наших домов и церквей лежит земное счастье, далеко-далеко за холмами. Каждому головорезу, у которого жадность вскружила голову, дайте лошадь и не выпускайте его из виду, пока он не скроется за холмами. Тогда должен вернуться покой.
TEXT.German: Trommelt die Leute zusammen! Lasst auf jedem Markte verkünden, dass der Reichtum des Landes unermesslich sei und jeder, der mit Lust und Wille in seine Tiefen vorstöße, das Gold mit bloßen Händen aufklauben könne! Vor allem fern unserer Häuser und Kirchen liegt das irdische Glück, weit, weit hinter den Hügeln. Gebt darauf jedem Halsabschneider, dem die Gier zu Kopfe gestiegen ist, ein Pferd und lasst ihn nicht aus den Augen, bis er hinter den Hügeln ist. Dann sollte wieder Ruhe einkehren.
TEXT.Italian: So get every venturer on a horse and right out of town. They may found their own gold somewhere far, far away ...
TEXT.Spanish: So get every venturer on a horse and right out of town. They may found their own gold somewhere far, far away ...

TEXT.English: So they want my gold? Well, force some of those volunteering scum to join the pirates. Of course, we´ve never talked about this, right?
TEXT.French: Неужели к моим добрым колонистам не примешиваются отбросы из водостоков? Сообщите в пабах, что есть что-то стоящее. Да, а если сволочи растратят награбленное и проиграют, заковать их в цепи и тайком отвезти на старую баржу в гавани. Там они могут выбрать, хотят ли они погасить свой долг по крупицам или быть выпоротыми до крови у позорного столба.
TEXT.German: Ei, da hat sich unter meine braven Kolonisten doch nicht der Abschaum der Gosse gemischt? Wohlan, lasst die Türen unverschlossen, streut weiter in den Kneipen, wo es etwas zu holen gibt. Ja, und wenn das Pack seine Beute versaufet und verspielet, dann legt sie in Ketten und bringt sie heimlich auf den alten Kahn im Hafen. Dort dürfen sie dann wählen, ob sie ihre Schuld Prise für Prise abzahlen oder mit Peitsche und Pranger abbluten wollen.
TEXT.Italian: So they want my gold? Well, force some of those volunteering scum to join the pirats, and of course, we´ve never talked about this, right?
TEXT.Spanish: So they want my gold? Well, force some of those volunteering scum to join the pirats, and of course, we´ve never talked about this, right?

TEXT.English: An old ship sets sail ...
TEXT.French: Старинный корабль отправляется в плавание...
TEXT.German: Ein alter Kahn sticht im Schatten der Unruhe unter Kapitän Jakob Spatz in See ...
TEXT.Italian: An old ship sets sail ...
TEXT.Spanish: An old ship sets sail ...

TEXT.English: A change in the currents has disrupted usual spawning patterns, and fishermen trawling from the ports of %s2_city are hauling in an unusually rich catch. Although seasonal yields are booming, local elders grumble that such intense harvesting may jeopardize the catch in years to come.
TEXT.French: Изменение течения нарушило обычные схемы нереста. Рыбаки из портов [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] вылавливают необычайно богатый улов. Хотя сезонные урожаи растут, местные старейшины ворчат, что это может поставить под угрозу улов в ближайшие годы.
TEXT.German: Eine Strömungsänderung hat das übliche Laichverhalten gestört und die Fischerleute aus %s2_city ziehen ungewöhnlich reiche Fänge auf ihre Boote. Obwohl die saisonalen Erträge in die Höhe schiessen, raten örtliche erfahrene Fischer zur Zruückhaltung, um durch die das intensive Fischen nicht die Erträge der kommenden Jahre zu gefährden.
TEXT.Italian: A change in the currents has disrupted usual spawning patterns, and fishermen trawling from the ports of %s2_city are hauling in an unusually rich catch. Although seasonal yields are booming, local elders grumble that such intense harvesting may jeopardize the catch in years to come.
TEXT.Spanish: A change in the currents has disrupted usual spawning patterns, and fishermen trawling from the ports of %s2_city are hauling in an unusually rich catch. Although seasonal yields are booming, local elders grumble that such intense harvesting may jeopardize the catch in years to come.

TEXT.English: Obstreporous nonsense! Spread wide the nets!
TEXT.French: Ерунда! Раскинь сети пошире!
TEXT.German: Was für ein Schwachsinn! Werft die Netze weit aus!
TEXT.Italian: Obstreporous nonsense! Spread wide the nets!
TEXT.Spanish: Obstreporous nonsense! Spread wide the nets!

TEXT.English: Verily, we must be wise stewards of the sea. Let us set strict limits for the remainder of the season.
TEXT.French: Воистину, мы должны быть мудрыми управителями моря. Давайте установим строгие ограничения на оставшуюся часть сезона.
TEXT.German: Wahrhaftig, wir sollten auf die weisen Männer hören. Lasst uns strenge Fangquoten für die restliche Saison festlegen.
TEXT.Italian: Verily, we must be wise stewards of the sea. Let us set strict limits for the remainder of the season.
TEXT.Spanish: Verily, we must be wise stewards of the sea. Let us set strict limits for the remainder of the season.

TEXT.English: Attracted by wild rumors of rich local silver deposits, independent foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claimjumpers may have taken the best pickings for themselves!
TEXT.French: Привлеченные слухами о богатых месторождениях серебра, иностранные старатели устремляются в горы возле [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT]. Эти прохвосты стремятся заполучить лучшие самородки!
TEXT.German: Durch wilde Gerüchte bezüglich reicher Silbervorkommen angelockt, strömen fremde Glücksuchende in die Berge nahe %s2_city. Bald werden diese die besten Claims für sich beansprucht haben!
TEXT.Italian: Attracted by wild rumors of rich local silver deposits, independent foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claimjumpers may have taken the best pickings for themselves!
TEXT.Spanish: Attracted by wild rumors of rich local silver deposits, independent foreign prospectors have been pouring into the mountains near %s2_city. Before long, these itinerant claimjumpers may have taken the best pickings for themselves!

TEXT.English: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners in exchange for a large share of the first year's profits.
TEXT.French: Продайте права собственности более преуспевающим шахтерам в обмен на большую долю прибыли за первый год.
TEXT.German: Verkauft Claimrechte an die wohlhabenderen unter ihnen und verlangt dafür einen Anteil am Profit des ersten Jahres.
TEXT.Italian: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners in exchange for a large share of the first year's profits.
TEXT.Spanish: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners in exchange for a large share of the first year's profits.

TEXT.English: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners, demanding all the money up front.
TEXT.French: Продайте правоустанавливающие документы более преуспевающим шахтерам, требуя все деньги вперед.
TEXT.German: Verkauft Claimrechte an die wohlhabenderen unter ihnen und verlangt dafür eine sofortige Vorausbezahlung.
TEXT.Italian: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners, demanding all the money up front.
TEXT.Spanish: Sell claim deeds to the more prosperous miners, demanding all the money up front.

TEXT.English: Pay to outfit them with the finest equipment, as long as they agree to become our loyal subjects.
TEXT.French: Платите, чтобы снабдить их лучшим снаряжением, если они согласятся стать нашими верными подданными.
TEXT.German: Stattet sie mit bester Ausrüstung aus, wenn sie sich bereit erklären unsere loyalen Untertanen zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Pay to outfit them with the finest equipment, as long as they agree to become our loyal subjects.
TEXT.Spanish: Pay to outfit them with the finest equipment, as long as they agree to become our loyal subjects.

TEXT.English: Run them out of town! This silver is mine alone!
TEXT.French: Выгнать их из города! Это серебро принадлежит только мне!
TEXT.German: Vertreibt sie aus der Stadt! Dieses Silber gehört uns alleine!
TEXT.Italian: Run them out of town! This silver is mine alone!
TEXT.Spanish: Run them out of town! This silver is mine alone!

TEXT.English: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are suspected to be witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!
TEXT.French: Горожане шепчутся, что женщины большой семьи недавних иммигрантов в [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] — ведьмы! Они держатся особняком, собирают какие-то коренья в недалеко от города и не ходят в церковь по воскресеньям. У одной из них даже есть родимое пятно!
TEXT.German: Die Bevölkerung flüstert, dass eine grosse Familie, die kürzlich in %s2_city eingewandert ist, unter dem Verdacht der Hexerei steht. Sie bleiben unter sich, bauen seltsame Wurzeln und Kräuter an und nehmen nicht an Gottesdiensten teil. Einer von Ihnen hat sogar ein auffallendes Geburtsmal.
TEXT.Italian: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are suspected to be witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!
TEXT.Spanish: The townsfolk are whispering that a large family of recent immigrants to %s2_city are suspected to be witches! They keep to themselves, grow strange roots in cottage gardens, and don't attend church on Sundays. One of them even has a birthmark!

TEXT.English: This is superstitious nonsense. Of course they are welcome in our community, birthmarks or not.
TEXT.French: Это суеверный вздор. Мы примем их в нашем сообществе, есть ли у них родимые пятна или нет.
TEXT.German: Das ist abergläubischer Unsinn. Sie sind selbstverständlich in unserer Gemeinschaft willkommen.
TEXT.Italian: This is superstitious nonsense. Of course they are welcome in our community, birthmarks or not.
TEXT.Spanish: This is superstitious nonsense. Of course they are welcome in our community, birthmarks or not.

TEXT.English: A grave accusation that must be taken seriously! Impound them, and send for a learned expert from Europe to deliberate the matter.
TEXT.French: Серьезное обвинение, к которому следует отнестись серьезно! Арестуйте их и пошлите за образованным экспертом из Европы для обсуждения этого вопроса.
TEXT.German: Eine schwere Anschuldigung, die aber ernst genommen werden muss. Nehmt sie vorläufig fest und schickt nach einem Experten aus Europa um den Sachverhalt zu klären.
TEXT.Italian: A grave accusation that must be taken seriously! Impound them, and send for a learned expert from Europe to deliberate the matter.
TEXT.Spanish: A grave accusation that must be taken seriously! Impound them, and send for a learned expert from Europe to deliberate the matter.

TEXT.English: Throw them all into the river. If they float, they are surely agents of the devil! If not, then at least we have proven our piety.
TEXT.French: Бросьте их всех в реку. Если они всплывут, то они точно посланцы дьявола! Если нет, то Господь наградит их за страдания.
TEXT.German: Werft sie alle gefesselt in den Fluss. Falls sie nicht unter gehen, sind sie mit dem Teufel im Bunde. Falls doch, habe wir wenigstens unsere Gottesfürchtigkeit bewiesen.
TEXT.Italian: Throw them all into the river. If they float, they are surely agents of the devil! If not, then at least we have proven our piety.
TEXT.Spanish: Throw them all into the river. If they float, they are surely agents of the devil! If not, then at least we have proven our piety.

TEXT.English: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!
TEXT.French: У нашего любимого монарха внезапно сложилось эксцентричное мнение, что курение табака вредно для легких и он даже опубликовал брошюру, осуждающую эту привычку. Эта идиотская идея может разрушить наш экспортный рынок!
TEXT.German: Unser geliebter Herrscher hat kürzlich eine exzentrische Meinung zum Tabakgenuss entwickelt. Er glaubt, dies sei schadhaft für die Lungen. Er will sogar so weit gehen ein Pamphlet zu veröffentlichen, dass davor warnt. Dies bizarre Idee kann unsere Exporteinnahmen schwer schädigen.
TEXT.Italian: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!
TEXT.Spanish: Our beloved monarch has suddenly developed an eccentric opinion that tobacco smoking is injurious to the lungs, even going so far as to publish a pamphlet denouncing the habit. This bizarre idea could ruin our export market!

TEXT.English: As strange and misguided as this may be, we have little choice but to accept it.
TEXT.French: Каким бы странным и ошибочным это ни казалось, у нас нет иного выбора, кроме как принять это.
TEXT.German: So selstam und fehlgeleitet dieser Gedanke auch ist, so müssen wir die Meinung unserer Herrschers akzeptieren.
TEXT.Italian: As strange and misguided as this may be, we have little choice but to accept it.
TEXT.Spanish: As strange and misguided as this may be, we have little choice but to accept it.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Знать и горожане следуют примеру своего короля. Спрос на наши колониальные товары снижается.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Eure Antwort wurde dem König zugetragen. Kammerdiener berichten, er habe gleich eine Probe verköstigt und anschließend huldvoll genickt.[NEWLINE]Adlige und reiche Bürger in unserer Heimat eifern nun dem König nach. Die Nachfrage nach unseren Kolonialwaren sinkt.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Nobles and citizens are following the example of their king. Demand for our colonial goods is declining.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: His Highness has clearly taken leave of his senses! We must fund opposing pamphleteers to shut down this preposterous calumny!
TEXT.French: Его Высочество явно потерял рассудок! Мы должны профинансировать оппозиционных памфлетистов, чтобы опровергнуть эту нелепую клевету!
TEXT.German: Unsere Hoheit hat anscheinend seinen klaren Verstand verloren! Wir müssen sofort ein gegenteiliges Pamphlet finanzieren.
TEXT.Italian: His Highness has clearly taken leave of his senses! We must fund opposing pamphleteers to shut down this preposterous calumny!
TEXT.Spanish: His Highness has clearly taken leave of his senses! We must fund opposing pamphleteers to shut down this preposterous calumny!

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment in this matter.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Его Величеству сообщили, что граждане в колониях сомневаются в Его решении по этому поводу.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Der König ist höchst unerfreut dass man sein Urteil zu dieser Angelegenheit in Frage stellt.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The king receives word that his citizens in the colonies are questioning his judgment.[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.French: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Цена растёт, так как благодаря новому предложению горожане теперь знают, что ворвань горит лучше, чем обычный жир.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.German: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]Die Nachfrage nach edlem Tranöl in Europa steigt, da die braven Bürger sich aufgrund des neuen Angebots darüber bewusst werden, dass öl besser brennt als Talg.[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Italian: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_FONT_GOLD]The price increases since - due to the new offer - the citizens become aware that train oil burns better than tallow[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?
TEXT.French: Милорд, Королевский флот требует один из наших лучших кораблей для помощи в кампании против берберских пиратов. Что мы им ответим?
TEXT.German: Exzellenz, die Royal Navy hat eines unserer besten Schiffe requiriert um in einer Kampagne gegen Piraten zu unterstützen. Wie sollen wir darauf reagieren?
TEXT.Italian: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?
TEXT.Spanish: Your Lordship, the Royal Navy has requisitioned one of our finest ships to aid in a campaign against the Barbary Pirates. How shall we respond?

TEXT.English: We are duty bound to answer. The ship is theirs.
TEXT.French: Мы обязаны дать ответ. Корабль принадлежит им.
TEXT.German: Unsere Pflicht gebiete uns zu unterstützen. Sie sollen das Schiff haben.
TEXT.Italian: We are duty bound to answer. The ship is theirs.
TEXT.Spanish: We are duty bound to answer. The ship is theirs.

TEXT.English: Let them build their own ships! We cannot foresake the defense of our shores.
TEXT.French: Пусть строят свои собственные корабли! Мы не можем отказаться от защиты наших берегов.
TEXT.German: Sie sollen gefälligst ihre eigenen Schiffe nutze. Unsere Küsten dürfen nicht ungeschützt bleiben.
TEXT.Italian: Let them build their own ships! We cannot foresake the defense of our shores.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them build their own ships! We cannot foresake the defense of our shores.

TEXT.English: The Royal Navy has returned our Frigate, somewhat the worse for wear, though with a generous share of booty in her hold!
TEXT.French: Королевский флот вернул наш фрегат, немного потрепанный, но с щедрой долей добычи в трюме!
TEXT.German: Die Royal Navy hat unser Schiff zürückgegeben. Es ist zwar etwas mitgenommen, aber als Ausgleich erhalten wir einen grosszügigen Anteil an der Beute in Frachtraum.
TEXT.Italian: The Royal Navy has returned our Frigate, somewhat the worse for wear, though with a generous share of booty in her hold!
TEXT.Spanish: The Royal Navy has returned our Frigate, somewhat the worse for wear, though with a generous share of booty in her hold!

TEXT.English: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our converted native subjects, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.
TEXT.French: Королевский двор очарован искусством и историями нашего крещенного индейца и требует, чтобы мы отправили его в Европу.
TEXT.German: Der königliche Hof ist fasziniert von der Kunst und Geschichten der Ureinwohner. Man wünscht, dass wir einen Konvertierten Ureinwohner nach Europa schicken.
TEXT.Italian: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our native converts, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.
TEXT.Spanish: The Royal Court has been taken with the picturesque garb and customs of certain of our native converts, and has sent for them to be transported to Europe.

TEXT.English: As they wish.. perhaps this will help us to curry favour at Court.
TEXT.French: Как им будет угодно... возможно, это поможет нам выслужиться перед Двором.
TEXT.German: Wir werden dem Wunsch folgen. Vielleicht bringt uns das ja auch einen Gefallen bei Hofe ein.
TEXT.Italian: As they wish.. perhaps this will help us to curry favour at Court.
TEXT.Spanish: As they wish.. perhaps this will help us to curry favour at Court.

TEXT.English: These people are human beings, not a museum exhibit!
TEXT.French: Индейцы - живые люди, а не музейные экспонаты!
TEXT.German: Wir sprechen hier von Menschen und nicht von Ausstellungsstücken!
TEXT.Italian: These people are human beings, not a museum exhibit!
TEXT.Spanish: These people are human beings, not a museum exhibit!

TEXT.English: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of Lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at the docks of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Королевский флот затребовал [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]две полные партии пиломатериалов[COLOR_REVERT] для строительства новых кораблей, которые должны быть доставлены как можно скорее в доки [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Die Royal Navy hat 200 Tonnen Holz für den Bau neuer Schiffe angefordert. Das Holz soll so bald wie möglich ine einer Siedlung mit Dock oder Zollhaus bereitgestellt werden.
TEXT.Italian: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at any settlement with a Dock or Customs House.
TEXT.Spanish: The Royal Navy has requisitioned 200 tons of lumber for the construction of new ships. The goods are to be collected as soon as possible at any settlement with a Dock or Customs House.

TEXT.English: Fulfill these requirements for the following results:
TEXT.French: Выполните эти требования для следующих результатов:
TEXT.German: Leider ist es unserer bescheidenen Wirtschaft nicht möglich dieser Anfrage gerecht zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.
TEXT.Spanish: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.

TEXT.English: Consider it done sir! Our doughty lumberjacks will set to work straight away.
TEXT.French: Считайте, что дело сделано, Ваше Величество! Наши умелые лесорубы немедленно приступят к работе.
TEXT.German: Betrachtet es als erledigt! Unsere Holzfäller werden sich sofort an die Arbeit machen.
TEXT.Italian: Consider it done sir! Our doughty lumberjacks will set to work straight away.
TEXT.Spanish: Consider it done sir! Our doughty lumberjacks will set to work straight away.

TEXT.English: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.
TEXT.French: Увы, с сожалением вынужден сообщить вам, что наша скромная промышленность не в состоянии удовлетворить этот спрос.
TEXT.German: Leider ist es unserer bescheidenen Wirtschaft nicht möglich dieser Anfrage gerecht zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.
TEXT.Spanish: Alas, I regret to inform you that our humble industries have not the capacity to meet this demand.

TEXT.English: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.
TEXT.French: Представители Королевского флота прибыли в [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT], чтобы принять [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]две полные партии пиломатериалов[COLOR_REVERT] в соответствии с нашей предыдущей договоренностью.
TEXT.German: Representanten der Royal Navy sind in %s2_city angekommen um die versprochene Lieferung der 200 Tonnen Holz entgegen zu nehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.
TEXT.Spanish: Representatives of the Royal Navy have arrived at %s2_city to take delivery of 200 tons of lumber, as promised per our previous arrangement.

TEXT.English: Instantly and without delay! May these fine planks serve His Majesty's fleet well.
TEXT.French: Моментально и без задержек! Пусть эти прочные доски хорошо послужат флоту Его Величества.
TEXT.German: Selbstverständlich! Mögen diese feinen Planken der Flotte seiner Majestät gut dienen.
TEXT.Italian: Instantly and without delay! May these fine planks serve His Majesty's fleet well.
TEXT.Spanish: Instantly and without delay! May these fine planks serve His Majesty's fleet well.

TEXT.English: I regret to say we now have other uses for these goods. The deal is off.
TEXT.French: С сожалением должен сказать, что теперь у нас есть другое применение этим товарам. Сделка отменяется.
TEXT.German: Wir bedauern zutiefst, aber wir brauchen diese Waren dringend selbst.
TEXT.Italian: I regret to say we now have other uses for these goods. The deal is off.
TEXT.Spanish: I regret to say we now have other uses for these goods. The deal is off.

TEXT.English: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter Coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Его Величество решил профинансировать полярную экспедицию в поисках легендарной Terra Australis. У скорняков города [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] были заказаны 200 ящиков хороших зимних пальто.
TEXT.German: Seine königliche Hoheit hat beschlossen eine Polar-Expedition auszustatten um das sagenhafte Terra Australis zu finden. 200 Ladungen der besten Mäntel werden von den Pelzhändlern von %s2_city verlangt.
TEXT.Italian: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter Coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: His Royal Highness has decided to finance a polar expedition in search of the fabled Terra Australis. 200 crates of fine winter Coats have been commissioned from the furriers of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Your wish is our command, sire. May every iceberg be claimed in your honour!
TEXT.French: Ваше желание - приказ для нас, Ваше Величество. Да будет покорен каждый айсберг во имя Его Величества!
TEXT.German: Euer Wunsch ist unser Befehl. Möge jeder Eisberg im Namen seiner Majestät bezwungen werden!
TEXT.Italian: Your wish is our command, sire. May every iceberg be claimed in your honour!
TEXT.Spanish: Your wish is our command, sire. May every iceberg be claimed in your honour!

TEXT.English: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of Coats for their polar expedition.
TEXT.French: Исследователи Его Величества прибыли, чтобы забрать партию пальто для своей полярной экспедиции.
TEXT.German: Die Entdecker seiner Majestät sind angekommen um die Ladung Mäntel für die Polar-Expedition abzuholen.
TEXT.Italian: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of Coats for their polar expedition.
TEXT.Spanish: His Majesty's explorers have arrived to collect the shipment of Coats for their polar expedition.

TEXT.English: Take them with our best wishes for a safe journey. The fabled riches of Terra Australis shall be ours!
TEXT.French: Возьмите их с нашими наилучшими пожеланиями счастливого пути. Легендарные богатства Terra Australis должны стать нашими!
TEXT.German: Unsere besten Wünsche für ihre Reise. Die sagenhaften Reichtümer der Terra Australis sollen unserer stolzen Nation gehören!
TEXT.Italian: Take them with our best wishes for a safe journey. The fabled riches of Terra Australis shall be ours!
TEXT.Spanish: Take them with our best wishes for a safe journey. The fabled riches of Terra Australis shall be ours!

TEXT.English: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!
TEXT.French: Прошло довольно много времени, а оговоренный товар еще не доставлен в [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT]. Его Величество не привык ждать!
TEXT.German: Die Verzögerung der versprochenen Warenlieferung in %s2_city ist sehr bedenklich. Ihre Majestät ist nicht erfreut!
TEXT.Italian: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!
TEXT.Spanish: It has been quite some time, and the agreed-upon goods have yet to be delivered to %s2_city. His Majesty is not accustomed to being kept waiting!

TEXT.English: Our humblest apologies to the Court for the unforeseen delay - perhaps this small contribution will compensate for the inconvenience?
TEXT.French: Приносим свои скромные извинения Двору за непредвиденную задержку - возможно, этот небольшой вклад компенсирует неудобства?
TEXT.German: Unsere untertänigsten Entschuldigungen an den Hof für diese unvorhergesehene Verzögerung. Möge diese kleine Entschädigung diese Unannehmlichkeit vergessen lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Our humblest apologies to the Court for the unforeseen delay - perhaps this small contribution will compensate for the inconvenience?
TEXT.Spanish: Our humblest apologies to the Court for the unforeseen delay - perhaps this small contribution will compensate for the inconvenience?

TEXT.English: They'll be ready when they're ready. Or perhaps His Highness would like to personally lend a hand to the work effort?
TEXT.French: Они будут готовы, когда будут готовы. А может быть, Его Высочество хотел бы лично приложить руку к работе?
TEXT.German: Wir geben unser Bestes, doch es geht nicht schneller. Anstatt uns zu belästigen könnten die Abgesandten seiner Majestät ja selbst Hand anlegen.
TEXT.Italian: They'll be ready when they're ready. Or perhaps His Highness would like to personally lend a hand to the work effort?
TEXT.Spanish: They'll be ready when they're ready. Or perhaps His Highness would like to personally lend a hand to the work effort?

TEXT.English: By royal decree, all further trading in Coats shall be done through duly authorized agents of the Hudson Bay Company.
TEXT.French: Согласно Королевскому указу, вся дальнейшая торговля шубами должна осуществляться через уполномоченных агентов компании Гудзонова залива.
TEXT.German: Laut königlichen Beschluss dürfen alle weiteren Handelsgeschäfte mit Pelzen ab sofort nur noch durch Vertreter der Hudson Bay Company erfolgen.
TEXT.Italian: By royal decree, all further trading in Coats shall be done through the agents of the Hudson Bay Company.
TEXT.Spanish: By royal decree, all further trading in Coats shall be done through the agents of the Hudson Bay Company.

TEXT.English: Unnecessary and preposterous! My good sir, we are more than capable of handling the fur trade ourselves.
TEXT.French: Ненужное и абсурдное! Мой добрый сэр, мы более чем способны сами справиться с торговлей мехом.
TEXT.German: Absurd! Wir sind mehr als fähig den Pelzhandel im Sinne Ihrer Majestät zu führen.
TEXT.Italian: Preposterous! My good sir, we are more than capable of handling the fur trade ourselves.
TEXT.Spanish: Preposterous! My good sir, we are more than capable of handling the fur trade ourselves.

TEXT.English: As you wish. Of course, I assume a portion of the first year's dividend will be reserved for me.
TEXT.French: Как хочешь. Разумеется, я предполагаю, что часть дивидендов за первый год будет зарезервирована для меня.
TEXT.German: Wie Ihre Majestät wünscht. Wir nehmen aber an, dass ein gerechter Anteil der Gewinne an uns übertragen wird.
TEXT.Italian: As you wish. Of course, I assume a portion of the first year's dividend will be reserved for me.
TEXT.Spanish: As you wish. Of course, I assume a portion of the first year's dividend will be reserved for me.

TEXT.English: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.
TEXT.French: Банда угонщиков лошадей захватила лучших животных из нашего стада и грозится поджечь амбары, если мы станем их преследовать.
TEXT.German: Eine Bande von niederträchtigen Pferdedieben hat die besten Tiere unserer Herde geraubt und droht sogar damit die Stallungen und Scheunen zu verbrennen, wenn Sie verfolgt werden.
TEXT.Italian: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.
TEXT.Spanish: A band of dastardly horse rustlers has seized the finest animals in our herd, and threatens to torch the barns if they are pursued.

TEXT.English: Their threats be damned! Send a raiding party to recover the beasts and put the ruffians to justice!
TEXT.French: К чёрту их угрозы! Отправьте отряд, чтобы вернуть зверей и предать преступников правосудию!
TEXT.German: Wir geben nichts auf solche Drohungen! Entsenden eine Truppe um diese Verbrecher der Gerechtigkeit zuzuführen und die Pferde zurückzubringen!
TEXT.Italian: Their threats be damned! Send a raiding party to recover the beasts and put the ruffians to justice!
TEXT.Spanish: Their threats be damned! Send a raiding party to recover the beasts and put the ruffians to justice!

TEXT.English: We could use a few enterprising young lads like these. Offer them the horses and a pardon if they agree to join us as (somewhat) law-abiding citizens.
TEXT.French: Нам не помешало бы несколько таких предприимчивых молодых парней. Предложите им лошадей и помилование, если они согласятся присоединиться к нам как (в некоторой степени) законопослушные граждане.
TEXT.German: Lasst uns diesen armen Seelen einen anderen Weg aufzeigen. Bietet ihnen an die Pferde zu behalten, wenn Sie deren Wert bei uns abarbeiten.
TEXT.Italian: We could use a few enterprising young lads like these. Offer them the horses and a pardon if they agree to join us as (somewhat) law-abiding citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: We could use a few enterprising young lads like these. Offer them the horses and a pardon if they agree to join us as (somewhat) law-abiding citizens.

TEXT.English: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.
TEXT.French: Зима выдалась тяжелой. Стражники города [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] поймали индейцев из соседней деревни [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]%s1_player[COLOR_REVERT], пытавшихся украсть часть нашего скота для еды.
TEXT.German: Der harte letzte Winter hat die Ureinwohner einer nahen %s1_player Siedlung dazu verleitet Vieh der Herden von %s2_city zu stehlen, doch unsere wachsame Stadtwache hat sie dabei gefangen.
TEXT.Italian: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.
TEXT.Spanish: The winter has been hard, and the guards of %s2_city have caught a band of natives from a nearby %s1_player settlement attempting to steal cattle from our herds for sustenance.

TEXT.English: Let them go in peace with enough animals to feed their tribe, provided they let their chief know of our goodwill.
TEXT.French: Пусть идут с миром с достаточным количеством животных, чтобы прокормить свое племя, при условии, что они сообщат своему вождю о нашей благосклонности.
TEXT.German: Gebt Ihnen genug Vieh um ihr Dorf zu erhalten und lasst sie in Frieden ziehen. Dies sei ein Zeichen unseres guten Willens.
TEXT.Italian: Let them go in peace with enough animals to feed their tribe, provided they let their chief know of our goodwill.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them go in peace with enough animals to feed their tribe, provided they let their chief know of our goodwill.

TEXT.English: Drive a hard bargain to let them take the cattle in exchange for land and gold.
TEXT.French: Заключите жесткую сделку, чтобы позволить им забрать скот только в обмен на землю и золото.
TEXT.German: Gebt ihnen das Vieh, doch lasst sie einen hohen Preis if Form von Gold und Land zahlen.
TEXT.Italian: Drive a hard bargain to let them take the cattle in exchange for land and gold.
TEXT.Spanish: Drive a hard bargain to let them take the cattle in exchange for land and gold.

TEXT.English: Put them in irons and set them to work the fields! We can spare no charity for these thieving savages.
TEXT.French: Заковать их в кандалы и заставить работать в поле! Эти вороватые дикари не заслуживают милости.
TEXT.German: Legt den Dieben Eisen an uns lasst sie für diesen Frevel auf den Feldern Arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: Put them in irons and set them to work the fields! We can spare no charity for these thieving savages.
TEXT.Spanish: Put them in irons and set them to work the fields! We can spare no charity for these thieving savages.

TEXT.English: Relations with your King have improved.
TEXT.French: Отношения с вашим Королем улучшились.
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät ist über diese Antwort sehr erfreut.
TEXT.Italian: Your King is delighted by this reponse.
TEXT.Spanish: Your King is delighted by this reponse.

TEXT.English: Your King has been angered!
TEXT.German: Ihre Majestät ist über diese Reaktion sehr verärgert.
TEXT.Italian: Your King has been angered!
TEXT.Spanish: Your King has been angered!

TEXT.English: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and obstreporous perfidy has gone on long enough! In partial recompense of your numerous misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their rightful wealth!
TEXT.French: По указу Тайного Совета Его Королевского Величества ваше изменническое поведение и вопиющее вероломство продолжаются достаточно долго! В качестве частичного возмещения за ваши бесчисленные проступки, крупный штраф должен быть немедленно уплачен в королевскую казну, иначе королевские агенты получат право разграбить [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] и конфисковать ваше незаслуженное богатство!
TEXT.German: Durch unumstösslichen Beschluss Ihrer Majestät, wird euer verräterisches Handeln bestraft. Als teilweise Wiedergutmachung eurer vielen Vergehen, werdet ihr sofort eine Strafe zahlen oder königliche Abgesandte sind dazu authorisiert im Umland von %s2_city alles zu konfiszieren, was rechtmässig Ihrer Majestät gehört!
TEXT.Italian: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and obstreporous perfidy has gone on long enough! In partial recompense of your numerous misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their rightful wealth!
TEXT.Spanish: By solemn decree of His Royal Majesty's Privy Council, your treasonous and obstreporous perfidy has gone on long enough! In partial recompense of your numerous misdeeds, a heavy fine must be paid at once into the royal coffers, or royal agents are authorized to sack the countryside of %s2_city and confiscate their rightful wealth!

TEXT.English: By all means, sir; we did not wish to anger the Crown.
TEXT.French: Непременно, сэр! Мы не хотели рассердить Короля.
TEXT.German: Um Himmels Willen, wir würden niemals absichtlich Ihre Majestät verärgern!
TEXT.Italian: By all means, sir; we did not wish to anger the Crown.
TEXT.Spanish: By all means, sir; we did not wish to anger the Crown.

TEXT.English: Do your worst! These scheming ministers will never be satisfied till they wring every last drop of wealth from our honest citizens.
TEXT.French: Делай все возможное! Эти коварные министры никогда не успокоятся, пока не выбьют все до последней капли богатства из наших честных граждан.
TEXT.German: Wir erwarten euer Schlimmstes! Die gierigen Abgesandten Ihrer Majestät werden eh nie zufrieden sein, bevor sie unsere armen Bürger gänzlich geplündert haben.
TEXT.Italian: Do your worst! These scheming ministers will never be satisfied till they wring every last drop of wealth from our honest citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: Do your worst! These scheming ministers will never be satisfied till they wring every last drop of wealth from our honest citizens.

TEXT.English: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from the surrounding churches.
TEXT.French: Благодаря преданности и вкладу ваших людей собор [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] был провозглашен резиденцией нового архиепископства, привлекая паломников из окрестных церквей.
TEXT.German: Aufgrund der Verehrung durch die Bevölkerung und ihrer geschichtlichen Bedeutung, wurde die Kathedrale von %s2_city zum Sitze des Erzbischofs ernannt und zieht nun noch mehr Pilger aus der Gegend an.
TEXT.Italian: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from the surrounding churches.
TEXT.Spanish: Through the worship and toil of your people, the Cathedral of %s2_city has been proclaimed the seat of a new Archbishopric, attracting pilgrims from the surrounding churches.

TEXT.English: Glory be to the Almighty!
TEXT.French: Хвала Всевышнему!
TEXT.German: Ruhm sei dem Allmächtigen!
TEXT.Italian: Glory be to the Almighty!
TEXT.Spanish: Glory be to the Almighty!

TEXT.English: As your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.
TEXT.French: Поскольку ваши колонии теперь установили контакт с различными коренными народами, местный торговец из [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] предлагает инвестировать в сеть торговых постов, чтобы собирать редкие и ценные специи из далеких племен.
TEXT.German: Da unsere Kolonien nun Kontakt zu mehreren Ureinwohnerstämmen haben, hat ein örtlicher Händler vorgeschlagen von %s2city ein Netzwerka aus Handelsposten aufzubauen, dass seltene Güter von diesen Stämmen erwirbt.
TEXT.Italian: As your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.
TEXT.Spanish: As your colonies have now made contact with multiple native peoples, a local merchant in %s2city proposes a modest investment in a network of trading posts that can gather rare and valuable spices from distant tribes.

TEXT.English: A capital idea! But remember we expect good returns on the capital invested.
TEXT.French: Отличная идея! Но помните, что мы ожидаем хорошей отдачи от нашего инвестиционного капитала.
TEXT.German: Eine hervorragende Idee! Wir erwarten jedoch gute Erträge unserer Investition.
TEXT.Italian: A capital idea! But remember we expect good returns on the capital invested.
TEXT.Spanish: A capital idea! But remember we expect good returns on the capital invested.

TEXT.English: Alas, we can scarcely afford such a venture at the moment.
TEXT.French: Увы, в настоящее время мы вряд ли можем позволить себе подобное.
TEXT.German: Leider können wir uns solch ein Wagnis im Moment kaum leisten.
TEXT.Italian: Alas, we can scarcely afford such a venture at the moment.
TEXT.Spanish: Alas, we can scarcely afford such a venture at the moment.

TEXT.English: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!
TEXT.French: Наблюдая за растущим богатством наших морских торговцев, шайка пиратов собирается у наших берегов, требуя выкупа. Иначе они грозятся предать наши корабли огню!
TEXT.German: Durch den wachsenden Reichtum unserer Seehändler angelockt, hat sich eine dreckige Bande Piraten vor unseren Küsten versammelt. Sie verlangen Tausend Golddublonen als Lösegeld damit sie unsere Schiffe nicht in Flammen aufgehen lassen.
TEXT.Italian: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!
TEXT.Spanish: Spying the growing wealth of our sea traders, a scurvy band of pirates has gathered near our shores, demanding a thousand gold doubloons in ransom lest they put our shipping to the torch!

TEXT.English: The infamous pirate lord Roc Brasiliano sends an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver, threatening otherwise to send our vulnerable merchantmen to the bottom of Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?
TEXT.French: Печально известный пират Рок Бразилиано прислал эмиссара, требуя целое состояние в золоте и серебре. В противном случае он угрожает отправить наших морских торговцев в шкафчик Дэви Джонса. Что нам ему ответить, милорд?
TEXT.German: Der berüchtigte Piratenführer Roc Brasiliano sendet uns einen Abgesandten, der eine königliche Summe Gold und Silber fordert. Andernfalls droht er damit unsere verletzlichen Handelsschiffe auf den Grund von Davy Jones Reich zu schicken.
TEXT.Italian: The infamous pirate lord Roc Brasiliano sends an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver, threatening otherwise to send our vulnerable merchantmen to the bottom of Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?
TEXT.Spanish: The infamous pirate lord Roc Brasiliano sends an emissary demanding a princely fortune in gold and silver, threatening otherwise to send our vulnerable merchantmen to the bottom of Davy Jones' locker. How shall we respond?

TEXT.English: I suppose we have no choice. The loss of a dozen merchant ships would come to far less than this!
TEXT.French: Я полагаю, у нас нет выбора. Потеря дюжины торговых кораблей обойдется гораздо меньше!
TEXT.German: Wir haben vermutlich keine andere Wahl. Der Verlust eines Dutzend Handelsschiffe würde uns noch viel teurer kommen.
TEXT.Italian: I suppose we have no choice. The loss of a dozen merchant ships would come to far less than this!
TEXT.Spanish: I suppose we have no choice. The loss of a dozen merchant ships would come to far less than this!

TEXT.English: I will never knuckle under to these blackguards! Let them taste our steel and cannons!
TEXT.French: Я никогда не сдамся этим мерзавцам! Пусть они вкусят нашу сталь и пощупают наши пушки!
TEXT.German: Wir beugen uns nicht vor Banditen! Lasst sie unseren Stahl und unsere Kanonen schmecken!
TEXT.Italian: I will never knuckle under to these blackguards! Let them taste our steel and cannons!
TEXT.Spanish: I will never knuckle under to these blackguards! Let them taste our steel and cannons!

TEXT.English: Have you heard what he does to his prisoners! We must hand over the gold at once and count ourselves lucky.
TEXT.French: Вы слышали, что он делает со своими заключенными? Мы должны немедленно сдать золото и считать, что нам повезло.
TEXT.German: Habt ihr die Gerüchte gehört, was er seinen Gefangen antuen soll ? Wir sollten sofort die Summe übergeben und uns glücklich schätzen.
TEXT.Italian: Have you heard what he does to his prisoners! We must hand over the gold at once and count ourselves lucky.
TEXT.Spanish: Have you heard what he does to his prisoners! We must hand over the gold at once and count ourselves lucky.

TEXT.English: A pox on you sir! You shall learn what this colony is made of!
TEXT.French: Будьте прокляты! Вы узнаете, из чего мы сделаны в этой колонии!
TEXT.German: Alle Flüche der See sollen ihn treffen! Wir greifen zu den Waffen!
TEXT.Italian: A pox on you sir! You shall learn what this colony is made of!
TEXT.Spanish: A pox on you sir! You shall learn what this colony is made of!

TEXT.English: A European vintager has sold his finest wine plants to the colonies.
TEXT.French: Европейский винодел привез свои лучшие виноградные лозы в колонии.
TEXT.German: Ein Winzer aus Europa hat seine besten Weinpflanzen in die neue Welt verkauft.
TEXT.Italian: A European vintager has sold his finest wine plants to the colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: A European vintager has sold his finest wine plants to the colonies.

TEXT.English: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Европейский виноградарь предлагает продать нам свои лучшие виноградные лозы. И конечно, он хочет, чтобы ему платили золотом.
TEXT.German: Ein Winzer aus Europa bietet uns seine besten Rebstöcke zum Kauf. Er verlangt 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: A European vintager offers to sell us his best wine plants. He demands 400[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: That is a good offer. We will pay the vintager's price.
TEXT.French: Это хорошее предложение. Мы заплатим, сколько просит винодел.
TEXT.German: Das ist ein sehr gutes Angebot. Wir werden den Preis des Winzers zahlen.
TEXT.Italian: That is a good offer. We will pay the vintager's price.
TEXT.Spanish: That is a good offer. We will pay the vintager's price.

TEXT.English: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.French: В настоящее время мы не можем позволить себе такие инвестиции.
TEXT.German: Wir haben das Geld für diese Investition leider nicht.
TEXT.Italian: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.Spanish: We currently cannot afford such an investment.

TEXT.English: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.
TEXT.French: Местные индейцы продали часть своих растений красного перца европейским колонистам.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner haben europäischen Kolonisten Setzlingen ihres Roten Pfeffers verkauft.
TEXT.Italian: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.
TEXT.Spanish: Local Natives have sold some of their Red Pepper plants to European colonists.

TEXT.English: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Местные индейцы продадут нам несколько семян своего красного перца. Взамен они хотят получить золото.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner aus der Gegend bieten uns Setzlinge ihres Roten Pfeffers zum Kauf. Sie verlangen 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Italian: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: Local Natives offer us some seeds of their Red Pepper plants for sale. They demand 300[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: That is a good offer. We will pay the Natives their price.
TEXT.French: Это хорошее предложение. Мы заплатим туземцам их цену.
TEXT.German: Das ist ein sehr gutes Angebot. Wir werden den Preis der Wilden zahlen.
TEXT.Italian: That is a good offer. We will pay the Natives their price.
TEXT.Spanish: That is a good offer. We will pay the Natives their price.

TEXT.English: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.French: В настоящее время мы не можем позволить себе такие инвестиции.
TEXT.German: Wir haben das Geld für diese Investition leider nicht.
TEXT.Italian: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.Spanish: We currently cannot afford such an investment.

TEXT.English: Many Immigrants arrive sick and diseased in the New World due to the long voyage over sea.
TEXT.French: После долгого плавания по морю многие переселенцы достигают Нового Света, страдая от болезней.
TEXT.German: Viele Einwanderer kommen durch die lange Schiffsreise krank in der Neuen Welt an.
TEXT.Italian: Many Immigrants arrive sick and diseased in the New World due to the long voyage over sea.
TEXT.Spanish: Many Immigrants arrive sick and diseased in the New World due to the long voyage over sea.

TEXT.English: Some new Immigrants have arrived. But they seem to be diseased and sick from the long voyage on the ships.
TEXT.French: Прибыло несколько новых иммигрантов. После длительного путешествия они больны и слабы.
TEXT.German: Einige neue Immigranten sind eingetroffen. Sie scheinen durch die lange Schiffreise krank geworden zu sein.
TEXT.Italian: Some new Immigrants have arrived. But they seem to be diseased and sick from the long voyage on the ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Some new Immigrants have arrived. But they seem to be diseased and sick from the long voyage on the ships.

TEXT.English: These poors souls shall be welcomed. Give them something to eat so they can recover their strength.
TEXT.French: Эти бедняги должны быть приняты. Дайте им что-нибудь поесть, чтобы они могли восстановить свои силы.
TEXT.German: Diese armen Seelen sind uns wie alle anderen Willkommen. Gebt ihnen etwas zu Essen, damit sie wieder zu Kräften kommen.
TEXT.Italian: These poors souls shall be welcomed. Give them something to eat so they can recover their strength.
TEXT.Spanish: These poors souls shall be welcomed. Give them something to eat so they can recover their strength.

TEXT.English: Send them away. We cannot risk diseases spreading in our colonies.
TEXT.French: Гоните их прочь! Мы не можем рисковать распространением болезней в наших колониях.
TEXT.German: Schickt sie fort. Es muss verhindert werden, dass sich eine Krankheit oder gar eine Seuche in den Kolonien ausbreitet.
TEXT.Italian: Send them away. We cannot risk diseases spreading in our colonies.
TEXT.Spanish: Send them away. We cannot risk diseases spreading in our colonies.

TEXT.English: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.French: В деревнях индейцев распространяются болезни европейских переселенцев.
TEXT.German: Die Krankheiten des Weissen Mannes verbreiten sich in den Dörfern der Ureinwohner.
TEXT.Italian: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.
TEXT.Spanish: Diseases of the White Man are spreading in Native Villages.

TEXT.English: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after some of our citizens visited their village and are now asking for help.
TEXT.French: Болезнь распространяется в соседней деревне индейцев. Заболевание вспыхнуло после того, как наши колонисты побывали там. Сейчас туземцы нуждаются в нашей помощи.
TEXT.German: Eine Krankheit breitet sich in einer nahegelegenen Siedlung der Wilden aus. Sie behaupten, die Krankheit sei ausgebrochen nachdem einige unserer Siedler ihr Dorf besucht hatten. Sie bitten um unsere Hilfe.
TEXT.Italian: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after some of our citizens visited their village and are now asking for help.
TEXT.Spanish: A disease is spreading in a nearby Native village. The Natives believe the disease broke out after some of our citizens visited their village and are now asking for help.

TEXT.English: Send them some food. It is probably just a flu and the Native will be able to recover.
TEXT.French: Отправьте им немного еды. Это, наверное, просто грипп. Они должны выздороветь.
TEXT.German: Schickt ihnen etwas Nahrung. Es ist sicherlich nur eine kleine Erkältung und es geht ihnen bald besser.
TEXT.Italian: Send them some food. It is probably just a flu and the Native will be able to recover.
TEXT.Spanish: Send them some food. It is probably just a flu and the Native will be able to recover.

TEXT.English: They shall bring their diseased to our city. We will pay the doctors for their treatment.
TEXT.French: Они могут привезти своих больных в наш город. Мы будем платить врачам за их лечение.
TEXT.German: Die Wilden sollen ihre Kranken in unsere Stadt bringen. Wir werden die Doktoren bezahlen um sie zu behandeln.
TEXT.Italian: They shall bring their diseased to our city. We will pay the doctors for their treatment.
TEXT.Spanish: They shall bring their diseased to our city. We will pay the doctors for their treatment.

TEXT.English: We are deeply sorry, but there is nothing we can do to help.
TEXT.French: Нам очень жаль, но мы ничем не можем помочь.
TEXT.German: Wir bedauern zutiefst, aber es gibt nichts, was wir für sie tun können.
TEXT.Italian: We are deeply sorry, but there is nothing we can do to help.
TEXT.Spanish: We are deeply sorry, but there is nothing we can do to help.

TEXT.English: European Settlers discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Огромное месторождение соли было обнаружено колонистами недалеко от [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: Europäische Siedler haben grosse Salzvorkommen in der Gegend um %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: European Settlers discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: European Settlers discovered a huge salt deposit near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Local settlers report that on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.French: Местные поселенцы сообщают, что в близлежащих холмах в пустыне воздух очень солоноватый на вкус. Горнодобывающая экспедиция может поискать залежи соли, но это будет стоить золота.
TEXT.German: Lokale Siedler berichten, dass die Luft auf nahegelegenen Hügeln in der Wüste nach Salz riecht. Eine Minenexpedition könnte ein Salzvorkommen entdecken, wird aber 500[ICON_GOLD] kosten.
TEXT.Italian: Local settlers report that on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].
TEXT.Spanish: Local settlers report that on nearby hills in the desert, the air tastes very salty. A mining expedition might find salt deposits but will cost 500[ICON_GOLD].

TEXT.English: Send the mining expedition. Hopefully they will find something.
TEXT.French: Отправьте экспедицию по добыче полезных ископаемых. Надеюсь, они что-нибудь найдут.
TEXT.German: Schickt die Minenexpedition auf die Suche.
TEXT.Italian: Send the mining expedition. Hopefully they will find something.
TEXT.Spanish: Send the mining expedition. Hopefully they will find something.

TEXT.English: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.French: В настоящее время мы не можем позволить себе такие инвестиции.
TEXT.German: Wir haben das Geld für diese Investition leider nicht.
TEXT.Italian: We currently cannot afford such an investment.
TEXT.Spanish: We currently cannot afford such an investment.

TEXT.English: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bisons.
TEXT.French: Индейцы возмущены тем, что поселенцы охотятся на их бизонов.
TEXT.German: Die Ureinwohner sind verärgert, weil die Europäer zu viele Bisons jagen.
TEXT.Italian: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bisons.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives are angry because the White Man is hunting their Bisons.

TEXT.English: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demands that we stop hunting the bisons in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bisons belong to them and say that they need the meat of the bisons for survival.
TEXT.French: Туземцы сказали мэру одного из наших городов прекратить охоту на бизонов в этом районе. Они заявляют, что эту землю и бизонов им завещали их предки. Им нужно мясо бизона, чтобы жить и продолжать свой род.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner eines nahegelegenen Stammes sind an uns herangetreten. Sie fordern, dass wir die Jagd auf die Bisons der Gegend einstellen. Sie behaupten, dass die Bisons durch das Recht ihrer Vorväter ihnen gehören und sie diese zum Ueberleben brauchen.
TEXT.Italian: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demands that we stop hunting the bisons in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bisons belong to them and say that they need the meat of the bisons for survival.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives from a nearby tribe approach the mayor of one of our towns and demands that we stop hunting the bisons in the area. They claim that by the right of their ancestors those bisons belong to them and say that they need the meat of the bisons for survival.

TEXT.English: Although we cannot force our people to stop hunting bisons, we will share our food with our Native friends in exchange.
TEXT.French: Хотя мы не можем заставить наших людей прекратить охоту на бизонов, взамен мы будем делиться своей едой с нашими друзьями из числа индейцев.
TEXT.German: Wir können unsere Bürger nicht zwingen die Jagd auf die Bisons einzustellen, aber im Gegenzug werden wir unsere Nahrung mit unseren wilden Freunden teilen.
TEXT.Italian: Although we cannot force our people to stop hunting bisons, we will share our food with our Native friends in exchange.
TEXT.Spanish: Although we cannot force our people to stop hunting bisons, we will share our food with our Native friends in exchange.

TEXT.English: If our local friends have problems with acquiring enough food, they shall come to our cities. We will give them work and pay for their income.
TEXT.French: Если у наших друзей индейцев проблемы с продовольствием, пускай приходят в наши города. Мы дадим им работу и заплатим за их содержание.
TEXT.German: Wenn unserer wilden Freunde mit der Nahrungsversorgung Probleme haben, sollen sie doch in unsere Ortschaften kommen. Wir werden ihnen Arbeit geben und für ihr Einkommen aufkommen.
TEXT.Italian: If our local friends have problems with acquiring enough food, they shall come to our cities. We will give them work and pay for their income.
TEXT.Spanish: If our local friends have problems with acquiring enough food, they shall come to our cities. We will give them work and pay for their income.

TEXT.English: We are sorry if our Native friends have problems. But the Bisons are on our land. We will continue hunting them.
TEXT.French: Сожалеем, если у наших друзей индейцев есть проблемы, но бизоны находятся на нашей земле. Мы продолжим охоту на них.
TEXT.German: Wir bedauern, falls unsere wilden Freunde Probleme haben. Aber die Bisons sind auf unserem Land und wir werden sie weiterhin jagen.
TEXT.Italian: We are sorry if our Native friends have problems. But the Bisons are on our land. We will continue hunting them.
TEXT.Spanish: We are sorry if our Native friends have problems. But the Bisons are on our land. We will continue hunting them.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.
TEXT.French: Европейские колонисты в [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] срубили гигантское дерево, которое считалось священным для туземцев.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten aus %s2_city haben einen Giant Tree gefällt, der den Ureinwohnern heilig war.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to the Natives.

TEXT.English: Natives of a nearby tribe are heavily upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.
TEXT.French: Туземцы соседнего племени в ярости от того, что наши лесорубы срубили священное для индейцев гигантское дерево. Они требуют, чтобы лесорубы были переданы им для наказания.
TEXT.German: Ureinwohner eines nahegelegenen Stammes sind sehr verärgert, weil einige unserer Holzfäller einen Giant Tree gefällt haben, der ihnen heilig war. Sie fordern, dass wir ihnen die Schuldigen zur Bestrafung ausliefern.
TEXT.Italian: Natives of a nearby tribe are heavily upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.
TEXT.Spanish: Natives of a nearby tribe are heavily upset because our lumberjacks have cut down a giant tree that was sacred to them. They demand that the lumberjacks are handed over to them for punishment.

TEXT.English: We really regret this misunderstanding. We hope they will accept our retribution in gold and our promise that such an incident shall never happen again.
TEXT.French: Мы очень сожалеем об этом недоразумении. Мы надеемся, что они примут нашу компенсацию золотом и наше обещание, что подобный инцидент больше никогда не повторится.
TEXT.German: Wir bedauern diesen Vorfall zutiefst. Wir hoffen, dass sie unsere Entschädigung in Gold und unser Versprechen annehmen, dass so etwas nie wieder vorkommen wird.
TEXT.Italian: We really regret this misunderstanding. We hope they will accept our retribution in gold and our promise that such an incident shall never happen again.
TEXT.Spanish: We really regret this misunderstanding. We hope they will accept our retribution in gold and our promise that such an incident shall never happen again.

TEXT.English: Sacred Trees? We must immediately call for a Missionary to drive out such devilish beliefs.
TEXT.French: Священные деревья? Мы должны немедленно призвать миссионера, чтобы изгнать такие дьявольские верования.
TEXT.German: Heilige Bäume ? Wir müssen nach einem Missionar schicken lassen, der diesen teuflischen Glauben austreibt.
TEXT.Italian: Sacred Trees? We must immediately call for a Missionary to drive out such devilish beliefs.
TEXT.Spanish: Sacred Trees? We must immediately call for a Missionary to drive out such devilish beliefs.

TEXT.English: We are very sorry, but the tree has been cut and we can do nothing to revert that.
TEXT.French: Нам очень жаль, но дерево было срублено, и мы ничего не можем сделать, чтобы исправить это.
TEXT.German: Wir bedauern, aber der Baum wurde bereits gefällt und wir können das leider nicht rückgängig machen.
TEXT.Italian: We are very sorry, but the tree has been cut and we can do nothing to revert that.
TEXT.Spanish: We are very sorry, but the tree has been cut and we can do nothing to revert that.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.
TEXT.French: Европейские колонисты в городе [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] отпраздновали первый День Благодарения.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten in %s2_city haben das erste Thanksgiving gefeiert.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Thanksgiving.

TEXT.English: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful last year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for that celebration and if we want to sponsor the event.
TEXT.French: Поселенцы из одной из наших деревень хотят отметить удачный год и намерены пригласить и своих соседей индейцев. Они запрашивают у нас разрешения на празднование и вопрошают, не хотим ли спонсировать мероприятие.
TEXT.German: Die Siedler einer unserer Städte wollen ein erfolgreiches letztes Jahr feiern und auch ihre Nachbarn aus den nahegelegenene Ureinwohnerdörfern einladen. Sie bitten untertänigst um unsere Erlaubnis für dieses Fest und fragen, ob wir das Ereignis vielleicht sponsoren wollen.
TEXT.Italian: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful last year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for that celebration and if we want to sponsor the event.
TEXT.Spanish: The settlers from one of our villages want to celebrate a successful last year and intend to invite their Native neighbours as well. They ask for our permission for that celebration and if we might sponsor the event.

TEXT.English: That sounds like a wonderful idea. They shall take the food from their storage and will additionally receive some gold from our treasury.
TEXT.French: Звучит как прекрасная идея. Они возьмут еду из хранилища, а также могут получить немного золота из нашей казны.
TEXT.German: Natürlich werden wir diese hervorragende Idee unterstützen. Sie sollen die Nahrung aus ihren Lagern nehmen und zusätzlich noch etwas Gold aus der Schatzkammer erhalten.
TEXT.Italian: That sounds like a wonderful idea. They shall take the food from their storage and will additionally receive some gold from our treasury.
TEXT.Spanish: That sounds like a wonderful idea. They shall take the food from their storage and will additionally receive some gold from our treasury.

TEXT.English: There is no time for festivities. Tell them to get to work again.
TEXT.French: Сейчас не время для праздников. Прикажите им снова приступить к работе.
TEXT.German: Für Feierlichkeiten ist keine Zeit. Richtet ihnen aus, dass sie wieder an ihre Arbeit sollen.
TEXT.Italian: There is no time for festivities. Tell them to get to work again.
TEXT.Spanish: There is no time for festivities. Tell them to get to work again.

TEXT.English: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Halloween in the New World.
TEXT.French: Европейские колонисты в [COLOR_SELECTED_TEXT]%s2_city[COLOR_REVERT] отпраздновали первый День всех святых в Новом Свете.
TEXT.German: Europäische Kolonisten in %s2_city haben das erste Halloween in der neuen Welt gefeiert.
TEXT.Italian: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Halloween in the New World.
TEXT.Spanish: European colonists in %s2_city have celebrated the first Halloween in the New World.

TEXT.English: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Halloween'. It does sound like a quite wild event, almost heretical.
TEXT.French: Некоторые поселенцы, недавно прибывшие из Ирландии и других европейских стран, хотят отпраздновать то, что они называют «Хэллоуин». Звучит как дикое событие, возможно, еретическое.
TEXT.German: Einige Siedler, die erst kürzlich aus Irland und anderen europäischen Ländern angekommen sind, wollen ein Fest feiern, welches sie 'Halloween' nennen. Das Fest hört sich etwas supekt an.
TEXT.Italian: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Halloween'. It does sound like a quite wild event, almost heretical.
TEXT.Spanish: Some settlers that have recently arrived from Ireland and other European countries want to celebrate what they call 'Halloween'. It does sound like a quite wild event, almost heretical.

TEXT.English: Ah well, we shall allow them to keep up their traditions. This might even lead to more immigrants.
TEXT.French: Что ж, позволим им сохранить свои традиции. Это может даже привести к большему количеству иммигрантов.
TEXT.German: Wir werden sie ihre Tradition aufrecht erhalten lassen. Vielleicht führt dies ja soager zu weiteren Immigranten.
TEXT.Italian: Ah well, we shall allow them to keep up their traditions. This might even lead to more immigrants.
TEXT.Spanish: Ah well, we shall allow them to keep up their traditions. This might even lead to more immigrants.

TEXT.English: Your description of the celebration they plan does not sound very Christian. We cannot allow such heretical things.
TEXT.French: Ваше описание празднования, которое они планируют, звучит не очень по-христиански. Мы не можем позволить такие еретические вещи.
TEXT.German: Die Beschreibung dieser Feierlichkeiten klingt nicht sehr christlich. Wir können keine Ketzerei in unseren Kolonien zulassen.
TEXT.Italian: Your description of the celebration they plan does not sound very Christian. We cannot allow such heretical things.
TEXT.Spanish: Your description of the celebration they plan does not sound very Christian. We cannot allow such heretical things.

TEXT.English: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.
TEXT.French: Миссионера обвиняют в сексуальных домогательствах к туземным женщинам.
TEXT.German: Ein Missionar wurde beschuldigt Ureinwohnerinnen sexuell zu belästigen.
TEXT.Italian: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.
TEXT.Spanish: Missionary accused of sexually molesting Native women.

TEXT.English: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, who has been tied at his hands, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.
TEXT.French: Несколько индейцев из близлежащей деревни живут в одном из наших городов. Они привели миссионера со связанными руками и обвиняют его в сексуальных домогательствах к их женщинам.
TEXT.German: Einige Wilde aus einer nahegelegenen Siedlung sind in einer unserer Städte angekommen. Sie haben einen gefesselten Missionar bei sich und beschuldigen diesen, dass er ihre Frauen sexuell belästigt habe.
TEXT.Italian: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, who has been tied at his hands, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.
TEXT.Spanish: Some Natives from a nearby village have arrived in one of our cities. They have a Missionary with them, who has been tied at his hands, and they accuse him of having sexually molested their women.

TEXT.English: That is outrageous. Instantly free the Missionary. A man of the church cannot have done such things.
TEXT.French: Это возмутительно. Освободите миссионера немедленно! Человек церкви никогда бы не сделал таких вещей.
TEXT.German: Das ist unerhört. Befreit den Missionar sofort. Ein Mann der Kirche kann sich doch solcher Taten nicht schuldig gemacht haben.
TEXT.Italian: That is outrageous. Instantly free the Missionary. A man of the church cannot have done such things.
TEXT.Spanish: That is outrageous. Instantly free the Missionary. A man of the church cannot have done such things.

TEXT.English: Well, our Native friends have no reason to lie. We will punish the man. He shall never work as a Missionary or a Priest again.
TEXT.French: Что ж, нашим друзьям из числа индейцев нет причин врать. Мы накажем человека. Он больше никогда не будет работать миссионером или священником.
TEXT.German: Nun, unsere wilden Freunde haben keinen Grund zu lügen. Wir werden den Mann bestrafen. Er wird natürlich auch nie wieder ein kirchliches Amt inne haben.
TEXT.Italian: Well, our Native friends have no reason to lie. We will punish the man. He shall never work as a Missionary or a Priest again.
TEXT.Spanish: Well, our Native friends have no reason to lie. We will punish the man. He shall never work as a Missionary or a Priest again.

TEXT.English: A deserted wolf whelp has been found in the wilderness.
TEXT.French: В пустынной местности был найден брошенный волчонок.
TEXT.German: Ein verlassener Wolfswelpe wurde in der Wildnis gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: A deserted wolf whelp has been found in the wilderness.
TEXT.Spanish: A deserted wolf whelp has been found in the wilderness.

TEXT.English: Our men have found a deserted wolf whelp in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Eventually this young beast can be tamed or it could be sold to some crazy and bored rich man.
TEXT.French: Наши люди нашли в глуши брошенного волчонка. Его мать, вероятно, мертва. Возможно, этого молодого зверя можно было бы приручить или продать какому-нибудь безумно богатому человеку.
TEXT.German: Einer unserer Männer hat einen verlassenen Wolfswelpen in der Wildnis gefunden. Seine Mutter ist wahrscheinlich tot. Vielleicht kann das kleine Biest ja gezähmt werden. Oder wir verkaufen es einem Reichen, der gelangweilt genug ist.
TEXT.Italian: Our men have found a deserted wolf whelp in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Eventually this young beast can be tamed or it could be sold to some crazy and bored rich man.
TEXT.Spanish: Our men have found a deserted wolf whelp in the wilderness. His mother is probably dead. Eventually this young beast can be tamed or it could be sold to some crazy and bored rich man.

TEXT.English: Such a proud wolf is a pet worthy of a governor as master.
TEXT.French: Такой гордый волк — достойный питомец для губернатора.
TEXT.German: Solch ein stolzes Tier hat einen Gouvernuer als Herren verdient.
TEXT.Italian: Such a proud wolf is a pet worthy of a governor as master.
TEXT.Spanish: Such a proud wolf is a pet worthy of a governor as master.

TEXT.English: What can we do with such a rabid animal? Try to sell it.
TEXT.French: Что нам делать с таким бешеным животным? Попробуйте его продать.
TEXT.German: Wir haben für solch ein tollwütiges Tier keine Verwendung. Versucht es zu verkaufen.
TEXT.Italian: What can we do with such a rabid animal? Try to sell it.
TEXT.Spanish: What can we do with such a rabid animal? Try to sell it.

TEXT.English: Some left over construction materials from foundation of a colony were found.
TEXT.French: Найдены остатки строительных материалов после основания колонии.
TEXT.German: Einige übriggelassene Baumaterialien von der Gründung einer Kolonie wurden entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: Some left over construction materials from foundation of a colony were found.
TEXT.Spanish: Some left over construction materials from foundation of a colony were found.

TEXT.English: Some colonists of a recently founded city discovered that some materials were left over from its foundation. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Other citizens want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.
TEXT.French: У колонистов в недавно основанном городе остались материалы, оставшиеся от его строительства. Некоторые хотят построить часовню. Другие хотят таверну. Что бы мы ни решили, одна из сторон будет недовольна.
TEXT.German: Einige Kolonisten einer kürzlich gegründeten Stadt haben entdeckt, dass noch einige Baumaterialien übrig geblieben sind. Einige Bewohner wollen mit diesen Baumaterialien eine Kapelle errichten. Andere Bewohner wollen stattdessen eine Taverne bauen. Wie auch immer wir uns entscheiden, eine Seite wird unzufrieden sein.
TEXT.Italian: Some colonists of a recently founded city discovered that some materials were left over from its foundation. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Other citizens want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.
TEXT.Spanish: Some colonists of a recently founded city discovered that some materials were left over from its foundation. Some citizens want to use those for constructing a chapel. Other citizens want to build a tavern. Whatever we will decide, one party will be unhappy.

TEXT.English: The Chapel is the only reasonable choice for the children of Christ.
TEXT.French: Часовня — единственный разумный выбор для детей Христовых.
TEXT.German: Die Kapelle ist die einzige sinnvolle Wahl für die Kinder Christi.
TEXT.Italian: The Chapel is the only reasonable choice for the children of Christ.
TEXT.Spanish: The Chapel is the only reasonable choice for the children of Christ.

TEXT.English: The Tavern is more important because it will help to bring the citizens closer together.
TEXT.French: Таверна более важна, потому что она поможет сблизиться новым гражданам.
TEXT.German: Die Taverne ist wichtiger, da sie helfen wird, die Gemeinde näher zusammen zu bringen.
TEXT.Italian: The Tavern is more important because it will help to bring the citizens closer together.
TEXT.Spanish: The Tavern is more important because it will help to bring the citizens closer together.

TEXT.English: To avoid any arguments, the Materials shall be confiscated and sold.
TEXT.French: Во избежание каких-либо споров материалы подлежат конфискации и последующей реализации.
TEXT.German: Um Streit zu verhindern, sollen die Materialien einfach verkauft werden.
